com.example.mapnector.UserInterface

Class UIHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.mapnector.UserInterface.UIHelper

  • public class UIHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is holding most of the views(except of the create group ones and mail system) that are shown in MapsActivity on the main screen + left listView. All its needed for is to make other classes smaller and try to separate logic from ui stuff so it will be easier to navigate in the code for me.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  UIHelper.JoinLeaveBtnType
      Specifies what button is btnJoinLeaveGroup now; It is the same button that used for joining, leaving and requesting to join groups

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      android.widget.Button btnJoinLeaveGroup
      Btn that is clicked when we want to join,leave or request group; Changing button view by situation
      android.widget.Button btnOpenChat 
      android.widget.CheckBox chkAccessLocation
      whether to allow this group to see my location(only when users shown on left listView)
      android.widget.CheckBox chkSendLocation
      send location to firebase in general
      android.widget.EditText edtSearch 
      com.google.android.material.floatingactionbutton.FloatingActionButton floatingArrowBack 
      com.google.android.material.floatingactionbutton.FloatingActionButton floatingEye 
      com.google.android.material.floatingactionbutton.FloatingActionButton floatingPlus 
      android.widget.LinearLayout groupLayout
      The layout where the listView in mapsActivtiy located; the left part of the screen where map isn't shown is this layout
      android.widget.ListView lv
      listView in MapsActivity that shows groups/users
      android.widget.ListView lvMails
      listView in MapsActivity that shows mails(in right slidingPane layout)
      android.widget.TextView tvGroupDescrip 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UIHelper(android.app.Activity activity)
      Here we initialize the views, the SlidingPaneLayout(of mail system) and bind onClickListeners of the views to the MapsActivity

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clickFloatingArrowBack()
      What to do in case ARROW_BACK clicked in MapsActivity, hide some buttons, show others etc
      void clickFloatingEye()
      Handles what to do with the views when button EYE was clicked in MapsActivity; stuff like hide lestView, showother buttons, change button icon etc
      void groupSelected()
      What to do when we select a group from the lest listView - hide some buttons, show others etc.
      void updateJoinLeaveBtn(UIHelper.JoinLeaveBtnType type)
      function to customize btnJoinLeaveGroup by param, set it as we wish to
